entry.title: Template: Notes of a Young Doctor
entry.content: [Over 2000 lines of mostly css that we don't need here.]

Of afbeeldingen worden weergegeven in de lightbox wanneer erop wordt geklikt
Black as Egypt's Night
The Steel Windpipe
entry.content:
It was a cold Winter's night.

  • Very cold indeed.

  • Note to self: pad out ending

entry.title: Mishka, always a pleasure to read your adventures!...
entry.content:
Mishka, always a pleasure to read your adventures!

It's a shame you don't get more time for writing.
